# `index.Rmd`

This Rmarkdown file should contain your analysis and be saved in the root directory:

## **`index.Rmd`**

My final `index.Rmd` looks like this:

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::include_url(here::here("demos", "index.Rmd"))
```

and renders to:

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

knitr::include_url(here::here("demos", "index.html"))
```
